1. Information We Collect

Magic Mirror Dashboard accesses the following user data through Google APIs (with your permission):

  • Google Calendar event information
    - Event summaries, times, and dates
    - Read-only access only

2. Why We Collect It

We use this data to display your upcoming calendar events on the dashboard

3. How Your Data Is Used

Your calendar data is used only in your browser session to populate the dashboard.
No user data is stored, saved, or transmitted to any server controlled by us.
We do not share your data with third parties.

4. Data Storage

We do not store any personally identifiable information or calendar content on any server. All data is accessed via OAuth and rendered client-side in your browser session only.
